SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V6.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V6.PRV.INCLUDE.JBOSS_CLI@UNIX
:SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# = &UC4_JBOSS_CLI#
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_OPERATING_MODE# = 'Managed Domain' : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE# = '' : PRINT Profile must not be empty : EXIT 1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD# = '/profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#/subsystem=datasources' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# = 'data-source --profile=&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROFILE#' : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD# = '/subsystem=datasources' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# = 'data-source' :ENDIF
! Get encrypted password value :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PASSWORD#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! prepare parameters :SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = ''
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_CLASS# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--driver-class=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_CLASS# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_USERNAME# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--user-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_USERNAME# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PASSWORD# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--password=$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_MAX_POOL_SIZE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--max-pool-size=&UC4RB_JBOSS_MAX_POOL_SIZE# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_MIN_POOL_SIZE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--min-pool-size=&UC4RB_JBOSS_MIN_POOL_SIZE# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_JTA_INTEGRATION# = 'YES' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#, '--jta=true ') :ENDIF
failIfExisting() { echo Datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# already existed : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_FAIL_EXISTING# = "YES" exit 1 : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_UPDATE_EXISTING# = 'YES' updateIfExisting : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF : ENDIF }
updateIfExisting() { echo Updating datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#..
&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# --jndi-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_JNDI_NAME# --driver-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_NAME# --connection-url=&UC4RB_JBOSS_URL# &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command=":reload")
updateConnectionProperties
echo Successfully update datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# exit 0 }
updateConnectionProperties() { : IF &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES#, '"', '\"') IFS=',' read -ra ADDR <<< "&UC4RB_JBOSS_PROPERTIES#" for i in "${ADDR[@]}"; do ele="$i" if [[ ! "$ele" == *=* ]]; then break fi k=${ele%%=*} v=${ele#*=} k=$(trim $k) v=$(trim $v) if [ -z "$k" ]; then break fi command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD#/data-source=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#/connection-properties=$k/:add(value=\"$v\")" result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="$command") done : ELSE echo > /dev/null : ENDIF }
trim() { local var=$@ var="${var#"${var%%[![:space:]]*}"}" var="${var%"${var##*[![:space:]]}"}" echo -n "$var" }
echo Checking datasource existence..
! check if the datasource exists already result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD#/data-source=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource")
result=$(printf "%s\n" "$result" | grep '"outcome" => "success"')
if [ ! -z "$result" ]; then failIfExisting fi
echo Creating new datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#..
! create new datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_COMMAND# add --name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# --jndi-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_JNDI_NAME# --driver-name=&UC4RB_JBOSS_DRIVER_NAME# --connection-url=&UC4RB_JBOSS_URL# &UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_PARAMS#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
! re-check sleep 5 result=$(&UC4RB_JBOSS_CLI# --command="&UC4RB_JBOSS_DS_QUERY_CMD#/data-source=&UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME#:read-resource")
result=$(printf "%s\n" "$result" | grep '"outcome" => "success"') if [ -z "$result" ]; then echo Create datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# finished unsuccessfully. exit 1 fi
updateConnectionProperties
echo Successfully created datasource &UC4RB_JBOSS_NAME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
